dict.string: Easily change your systems default browser.

if [ "{query}" == "CURRDEFAULT" ]; then echo "The browser selected is already the default" elif [ "{query}" != "NOTFOUND" ]; then ./defaultbrowser -set "{query}" RESULT=$? if [ $RESULT != 0 ]; then echo $RESULT fi fi
